revised_title: Photonic Switching Technology for Wideband Local Networks
tldr: This article discusses the potential of photonic switching technology for enhancing the performance of synchronous self-routing switching matrices in wideband local networks. The author examines the use of optical technology to address the challenges of switching and routing signals in networks handling a wide range of data rates and call-set-up times. The article also explores the role of optical interconnects and optoelectronic logic devices in improving the efficiency and speed of data processing in these networks.
